abstract: Love Beets are baby beets cooked and seasoned with flavorings that give the naturally sweet roots nice personality, and they are available at Whole Food Markets and online at Fresh Direct.
snippet: Love Beets are baby beets cooked with flavorings that give the naturally sweet roots nice personality.
lead_paragraph: Love Beets are baby beets cooked with flavorings that give the naturally sweet roots nice personality.

headline.main: Baby Beets: Cute, Sweet and Handy
